thread.title: Nik Abduh: Critics of Act 355 fear the unity of Muslims
thread.title_full: Nik Abduh: Critics of Act 355 fear the unity of Muslims

title: Nik Abduh: Critics of Act 355 fear the unity of Muslims
text:
More 
Detractors of PAS' proposed amendments to Act 355 do not fear the law itself, but the unity of Muslims who back it and the "victory" of Islam that would ensue, said Nik Mohamad Abduh Nik Aziz. 
In a Facebook posting last night, the PAS youth chief said : "They do not fear the amendments to the act per se. It is negligible and does not affect them. Their lives will go on as usual. 
"What they fear is the unity among Muslims. Their products will stop 'selling'. Secular, liberals, socialists and those who live free of religious binds, all will buried." 
For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year. If you're already a subscriber, please sign in.
